headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Southern Company and the AI Energy Boom
summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer picked for his fantasy stock portfolio. Cramer said that the “stock’s been on fire” after the completion of its nuclear power plant construction project in Georgia. He commented: “Typically, I go with something healthcare here, but that group is down in the dumps right […]
